definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Many of the channel impairments described above can be mitigated on-chip using equalization.
sentences.chinese: 上面提到的信道损害可以在芯片上用均等化来减轻。

sentences.english: Channel coding is a fundamental method to improve the communication reliability.
sentences.chinese: 信道编码是提高通信的可靠性的必要手段。

sentences.english: Messages can be sent over either channel independent of format.
sentences.chinese: 消息可以独立于格式，通过任意一种信道进行发送。

sentences.english: But Allah is ever round the rejecters of Faith!
sentences.chinese: 真主是周知不信道的人们的。

sentences.english: A novel criterion of blind equalization is introduced for communication channels.
sentences.chinese: 本文对于通信信道提出了一种新的盲均衡准则。

sentences.english: It is compared with the segment linear interpolation method with regression.
sentences.chinese: 同时比较了分段线性插值加递归的信道估计方法。

sentences.english: Transmit and receive eigen-beamforming was employed in the presence of deteriorative fading correlation.
sentences.chinese: 采用发送和接收特征波束成型降低信道相关性的影响。

sentences.english: At last, the test curves of eight-channels HTS multiplexer are presented.
sentences.chinese: 最后给出八信道高温超导多路器的实际测试曲线。

sentences.english: Moreover, with multi-channels interconnection, resources from provinces, cities and counties have been sharing.
sentences.chinese: 子平台可分可合，多信道互联互通，省市县资源共享。

sentences.english: Tables provided for channel difference sequences can be utili…
sentences.chinese: 提供的频距表可直接用于信道分配。

sentences.english: The system can provide 30 or 60 delta modulation digital voice channels.
sentences.chinese: 系统能提供30或60增量调制音频信道。

sentences.english: An adaptive MLSE receiver based on per-survivor processing (PSP) for digital transmissions over high frequency (HF) channels is proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种适用于无线时变信道的逐幸存处理均衡器。

sentences.english: For this problem, the noisy channel based Uyghur neutralized vowel identification model is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出基于噪声信道的维吾尔语央音原音识别模型。

sentences.english: The design criterion of space-time code(STC) for quasistatic Rayleigh fading channels is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 对准静态瑞利衰落信道的空时码设计准则进行了研究。

sentences.english: Based on channel condition, the system can modify diffuse convolutional codes constraint length automatically.
sentences.chinese: 根据信道误码情况，系统可自动修改卷积码的扩散度。

sentences.english: The aberration can be emended by adaptive equalization technologies.
sentences.chinese: 自适应均衡可以校正信道产生的畸变。
